# What is electricity??

## Electricity is moving charged particles

</br> 

Every atom is made of particles 

:::{.incremental}
* Protons 
* Neutrons
* Electrons 
:::

![](Pictures/atom.png){.absolute top="300" right="70" height=400}

::::columns

:::r-stack
:::{.fragment .fade-out fragment-index="1"}
